thi-ap32:25.3: Tassa setuṁ vihārañca → tassa setuvihāre ca (bj); tesu setuvihāresu (si); tassa setū vihāre ca (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap32:36.2: kittiñca sakkataṁ → kittisukhaṁ piyaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); kittitasakkatā (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap32:40.4: vītarāgā bhavāmase → natthi dāni punabbhavo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
